channel.title: How would i set up a //portals code?[delta]
channel.description: im working on make c wars in deltascape i just need the portals to work so i dont have the //portals code in my delta source i need to make my own would it be just like this[code]//QUEST_1 OBJECTS //END OF QUEST_1 OBJECTS[/code] i made my own object code for delta cause it didnt come with it it worked fine would this be correct? [code]//portals //end of portals[/code]

item.title: How would i set up a //portals code?[delta]
item.dc:creator: @mrprostats1 mrprostats1
item.description:
@mrprostats1 wrote:

what client you using?
you can use mine and edit it for your own
mrprostats.smfforfree.com
OMG all i needed to do was add // PORTALS

Read full topic
